segments.text: Do you think the weather will be good this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh . That ’ s a pity . I thought that we might go hiking in the hills .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mmm ... Well we could go to that new art gallery instead .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes that might be a better idea .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe we ’ ll meet some of the artists too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok - let ’ s do that then !
segments.speaker: S1
